content: How do i avail a debit card?

To get a BPI debit card, open a deposit account at any BPI branch or online. Bring one valid government-issued photo ID plus one secondary ID, your initial deposit (Php 500 for a BPI Saver Plus ATM account), and proof of address. You can also open an account digitally at https://www.bpi.com.ph/personal/bank/digital-banking/mobile/open-account-online by uploading clear photos of the same documents.

response.message: How do i avail a debit card?

suggestions.suggestion: To get a BPI debit card, open a deposit account at any BPI branch or online. Bring one valid government-issued photo ID plus one secondary ID, your initial deposit (Php 500 for a BPI Saver Plus ATM account), and proof of address. You can also open an account digitally at https://www.bpi.com.ph/personal/bank/digital-banking/mobile/open-account-online by uploading clear photos of the same documents.

While you're looking for a debit card, if you want higher spending power and rewards, the BPI Rewards Card is worth considering. It requires a minimum monthly income of Php 15,000, earns 1 point for every Php 35 spent, includes free travel insurance up to Php 2 million, and offers flexible installment terms. The annual fee of Php 1,550 is waived for the first year for new-to-bank customers.

A BPI debit/ATM card has no annual fee and only requires a maintaining balance of Php 3,000 to avoid monthly service charges. If you decide to apply for a credit card later, note that the BPI Rewards Card has an annual fee of Php 1,550, while the BPI Signature Card carries Php 5,500/year. Many cards offer first-year fee waivers or waivers upon reaching annual spend milestones.
